record.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF SENATE AMENDMENT TO H.R. 2206, U.S. TROOP READINESS, VETERANS' CARE, KATRINA RECOVERY, AND IRAQ ACCOUNTABILITY APPROPRIATIONS ACT, 2007
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on ordering the previous question on House Resolution 438, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on ordering the previous question.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.

record.narrative: The yeas and nays were ordered.
